#summary The layer element is an obsolete method of positioning elements within a document.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-mozilla

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *layer element*

== Usage ==

Do not use `<layer>`.  It was introduced in [BrowserNetscape4 Netscape 4] and has never been supported by any other browser.
